TextView.android:text: Number of health facilities from which patients are devolved to DDD pick up points (PuP) or other DDD modalities for treatment ARVs
Number of individuals dispensing ARVs or PrEP at DDD pick-up points (PuP) or through other DDD modalities
Number of adults and children currently accessing ARVs through DDD pick-up points (PuP) or other DDD modalities
Number of health facilities from which patients are devolved to DDD pick up points (PuP) or other DDD modalities for PrEP
Number of DDD pick up points (PuP) and other DDD modalities providing PrEP to persons devolved from health facilities
Number of adult and pediatric ARV bottles (units) dispensed at DDD pick-up points (PuP) and through other DDD modalities, by ARV drug category at the end of the reporting period
Number of adult PrEP bottles (units) at DDD pick-up points (PuP) and through other DDD modalities, by PrEP drug category at the end of the reporting period
Number of individuals who were newly enrolled on oral antiretroviral pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) to prevent HIV infection in the reporting period at a DDD pick-up point or other DDD modality

Number of individuals, inclusive of those newly enrolled, that received oral antiretroviral preexposure prophylaxis (PrEP) to prevent HIV during the reporting period through DDD pick-up points (PuP) or other DDD modalities
Number of ART patients (who were on ART at the beginning of the quarterly reporting period) and then had no clinical contact since their last expected pick up
Number of individual case safety reports form [ADR reports] filled for devolved clients this reporting month
Number of devolved ART clients who are eligible to return back to Hospital for semiannual clinical and laboratory reassements this reporting month
Number of devolved ART clients who are eligible for viral load re-assessment this reporting month
